sections.Description (verbatim): You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading north, and a crawlway to the south. On the west is the bottom of a steep metal ramp which is unclimbable.
Blocked movements: W: "You try to ascend the ramp, but it is impossible and you slide back down."

Notes: First irreversible descent; establishes underground regime and darkness as navigational condition.
